allow: Bash(..\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe -c "from dbt.cli.main import cli; cli\(\)" run)
Bash("../.venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "from dbt.cli.main import cli; cli\(\)" run)

Bash(gh pr create --title "Add incremental load and schema evolution demos" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Add demo scripts showcasing dlt''s data engineering capabilities
- Fix dbt schema naming to use clean names \(`raw`, `staging`, `marts`\) instead of `main_*` prefix

## Changes
- **dlt pipeline**: Updated to support `write_disposition` parameter \(replace, merge, append\)
- **Schema change demo**: Shows automatic column addition when source schema evolves
- **Incremental load demo**: Shows merge/upsert behavior with primary keys
- **dbt macro**: Custom `generate_schema_name` for proper schema naming
- **Documentation**: Added DEMOS.md with instructions

## Test plan
- [ ] Run `python demos/schema_change_demo.py` - verify new columns added automatically
- [ ] Run `python demos/incremental_load_demo.py` - verify merge behavior
- [ ] Run `dbt run` - verify schemas are `raw`, `staging`, `marts` \(not `main_*`\)
EOF
\)")
